meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Invite</kanji> someone to <kanji>kidnap</kanji> you and you'll have a <vocabulary>kidnapping</vocabulary> on your hands. That wasn't very smart. You should try to be more careful.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
